SearchService
service in module accessimapEditeurDerApp

Description

Provide functions to get information on nominatim

Dependencies

  • $http
  • $q
  • SettingsService

Methods

  • retrieveData(point, queryChosen)

    Retrieve data from overpass for a specific point, and display the information on the svg element

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    pointObject

    Geographic point [lng, lat]

    queryChosenObject

    Query to ask to nominatim : shop, park, ...

    Returns
    Promise

    Promise with data for successCallback

  • searchAddress(address)

    Search to nominatim an address

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    addressString

    Address to search

    Returns
    Promise

    Promise with array of results for successCallback Could be empty, or having one or more results
